room_title: Escape room "The Masterpiece" by Enigma Escape Rooms in Buffalo
review: We had a great time trying to escape from the Art room. We did not make it in time but thoroughly enjoyed the hour and felt very challenged and entertained! This was a high quality, well done escape room! We definitely want to return again and try the other room. Thanks for a great time!

room_title: Escape room "The Masterpiece" by Enigma Escape Rooms in Buffalo
review: I'm glad we chose Engima for our first escape room. We had a great time with our family of 2 kids and 2 adults. They clearly put a lot of effort into creating a quality experience.

room_title: Escape room "The Masterpiece" by Enigma Escape Rooms in Buffalo
review: We had so much fun! Our small group of four made it out in time! Enigma certainly knows how to run a fun, challenging and diverse game! This was one of the highlights for our trip to Buffalo.

room_title: Escape room "The Masterpiece" by Enigma Escape Rooms in Buffalo
review: Unbelievable fun. Is the best hour you can possibly spend in the city. The staff was helpful and kind. The room was very challenging but I would definitely do it again.
